articles.title: Bitcoin plunges on Middle East war fears - ForexLive
articles.description: Bitcoin intraday It would be havoc right now if markets were open and it might yet be when they open in less than 24 hours. . Bitcoin is down more than 6% in what could be a sign of what's to come.

articles.title: Inside the Controversy That's Divided the Carbon Offsets Market - Bloomberg
